that's a classical game, with a looong history. But focusing on CS:GO, it's a game that has his strongest point on the competitive scenario. It can be a lot stressful if you play alone, you can try it, but if you has friends to play, the game starts to be the most funny one. Some people can bring you down in the beggining, but don't trust them, it's all bullshit. Community in CSGO is not aware of their unpolite behavior. Take some friends and start playing it. I bet you'll love it. GG!
